short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A data manipulation and export tool for Discord.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Subreddit for extension support - r/discrub
Users can mass Edit/Delete, Sort/Filter, and Export Discord messages.
Supported Export Formats: HTML, CSV, and JSON.

Version 1.12.4:
- Paginate Ko-Fi Feed and make feed hide-able.
- Clean up export dialog view.
- Support video embed previewing from any source (HTML).
- Preview images from Article embeds, when the respective setting is toggled (HTML).
- Add Embed Image and Video to Download Media categories (export).
- Make message table pagination sticky.
- Fix issue with rendered code formatted messages and add code highlighting support.
